text: Kilian Pagliuca (born 2 September 1996) is a Swiss footballer who plays as a forward. ==References== ==External links== * * Profile at DFB.de * Profile at kicker.de * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from the canton of Geneva Category:Swiss footballers Category:Switzerland youth international footballers Category:Swiss expatriate footballers Category:Swiss expatriate sportspeople in France Category:Expatriate footballers in France Category:Swiss expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Meyrin players Category:Servette FC players Category:Olympique Lyonnais players Category:FC Zürich players Category:FC Wohlen players Category:Hallescher FC players Category:FC Carl Zeiss Jena players Category:Swiss Challenge League players Category:Swiss Promotion League players Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:3.
